Articles.Content: 1333: It appears this floor is a spaceport. Kerbals bustle to and from their individual VTOL SSTOs. As you make the climb to the next floor, an explosion ensues and you witness firefighter kerbals on scene being propelled backwards by the recoil of their extinguishers...
1334: You stare out into the void and see... You don't know, but you realy hope that it never leaves the void.
1335: You have reached the edge of the atmosphere. Only 598,665 floors to go before you hit Keosynchronus orbit!

1336: You see Weegee. You become Weegee. OBEY WEEGEE.

 

Edited December 15, 2015 by TopHeavy11
1337: you see a puddle of juice that retaines iridescence.
1338: You realize that you forgot to make a "LEET" joke on the previous floor.

1339: The gift shop and exit. However, the exit is simply a door into the abyss below, and the gift shop doesn't sell any parachutes. You continue on to the next floor, hoping to find some scraps of fabric.
1340: a time machine
1341: a Delorean DMC-12 time machine
1342: You take a brake and watch Star Wars VII, in the conveniently placed cinema on this floor...
1343:You stop to eat some donuts, but get whisked away by the Kraken, and then you land on floor 1344.
1344: you die of lethal radiation in the lower Van Allen belt.
1345: A huge stash of Rad-Aways. You take enough to get through the Van Allen belt alive.
1346: You find the fifth dimension is love, cause the events that brought you here, touch your girlfriend through space-time, then get shot out of a black hole onto floor 1347 eighty years later.
1347: You die of lethal radiation in the upper Van Allen belt.

Accidental duplicate...

Edited December 18, 2015 by Guest
1348: The room where all the Conspiracy Theorists scream at you.
1349: You see @CliftonM screaming about having over 500 variables in his plugin.  Talking in the third person is weird...

1350: Wait, it's SCP-173! Don't look away or it'll snap your neck riiight off!

Edited December 28, 2015 by KerbinW365

1351: Jeb starts convulsing and finally collapses, but his fall activates a wormhole that teleports him one floor up. The wormhole causes him to experience time dilation and he is now technically 137 kerbal years old
1352: You pinch your nose to ensure that you are not dreaming.
1353: An empty room with the radio from Portal.
1354: A room full of crazed FNAF fans; luckily you have all the ingredients you need to make a molotov cocktail…
1355: after the incident, the next floor held crazed KSP fans. You decide to join them.
1356: This room looks like it's been a very long time since it's been occupied. The sun looks really, really big through the window and very red.
